media.title: Cowboy Bebop
media.description: 3 Bounty hunters with difficult pasts' travel the galaxy just trying to make enough woolongs to get some beef and bell peppers.

media.title: Howl's Moving Castle
media.description: Howl has been searching for Sophie their entire lives. How Far will they go for the people they love, and calcifer makes a bomb breakfast

media.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
media.description: This Kids got a weird taste for fingers dude, also whats up with the glasses?

media.title: Evangelion
media.description: It gets dark......really dark. But the end of the world isnt all fun an games when you have to run a giant mecha and your dad is a jerk

media.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventures
media.description: Something about a vampire and a mask, but they keep running into each other. And a lot of posing......

media.title: Hell's Paradise
media.description: Is it a normal island, or a cool island. Neither, its the afterlife. Our protaganists search for the Elixir of Life and have to deal with a very 'Last of Us' type situation.

media.title: Fairytale
media.description: Guild's, adventures, and danger, will you join?

media.title: Demon Slayer
media.description: Michael Jackson just wants to be able to moon walk in the sun, Tanjiro wont let that happen, not in this lifetime.

media.title: Hunter X Hunter
media.description: Determined to become the greatest hunter of all, there is a lot of running to get there though

media.title: Sword Art Online
media.description: Being stuck inside a MMORPG cant be that bad, unless you actually die in game....oh wait....
